levels.description:
Fires a lightning ball towards the target's position that lasts for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds. Every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds, the lightning ball deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all nearby enemies and has <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> them for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can hold {ct} charges</>
